name: Monster Mutt Rescue
description:
Help rescue a rare Monster Mutt by raising and training your Mutt from a baby to an adult. Nurture and play with your Mutt and watch it grow! As it grows, more and more games will unlock for you and your Mutt to play! Help others care for their Mutts and teach your Mutt to control its super powers and special skills!


Fun Features:

•FREE TO PLAY!

•Help your Mutt grow through multiple age levels!

•Design your Mutt’s own room!

•Play fun mini-games with your Mutt!

•Create your own mobile profile to share with friends!

•Earn rewards for taking care of other players Mutts!

•Make new friends through the Friend Finder!

•Play online with friends to experience more games and more Monster Mutt species!

•Connect with other Mutts online and play multiplayer games!

•Enjoy amazing 3D graphics!

•Use kid-friendly controls and instructions!

•Add up to 6 players per account!


If you like Monster Mutt Rescue, please take the time to rate it!

Email us at AppComments@jumpstart.com with your suggestions and comments as we cannot respond to reviews. We love to hear your ideas and feedback!

Like us on Facebook for exclusive updates, discount offers and news about our virtual world.
http://www.facebook.com/MathBlaster

Privacy Policy: https://policy-portal.truste.com/core/privacy-policy/Knowledge-Adventure/eee25c29-750d-42ae-919f-b06f6a12b832

Registration information is optional (children under 13 require parent registration). Will be used to notify of game fixes, updates, etc. along with allows for integration online.
- Does NOT include ads
- Does NOT link to social networks
- Does include links/information relative to other Knowledge Adventure games and apps
- Does use analytics/data collection tools
